headline.main: Florida Fines Security Company That Employed Pulse Gunman
headline.print_headline: Florida Fines Security Company That Employed Pulse Gunman

docs.snippet: A security company that employed a gunman who massacred dozens at a Florida nightclub faces a $151,400 fine for falsely listing psychological testing information on forms that allowed employees to carry guns....
docs.lead_paragraph: A security company that employed a gunman who massacred dozens at a Florida nightclub faces a $151,400 fine for falsely listing psychological testing information on forms that allowed employees to carry guns.

headline.main: Israel Attacks Syrian Post After Stray Shell Crosses Border
headline.print_headline: Israel Attacks Syrian Post After Stray Shell Crosses Border

docs.snippet: Israeli aircraft attacked a Syrian artillery post on Saturday after a stray shell from fighting in Syria's civil war landed inside the Israeli-controlled Golan Heights, Israel's military said....
docs.lead_paragraph: Israeli aircraft attacked a Syrian artillery post on Saturday after a stray shell from fighting in Syria's civil war landed inside the Israeli-controlled Golan Heights, Israel's military said.

headline.main: Venezuela Opposition Says Blocked From Meeting Near Summit
headline.print_headline: Venezuela Opposition Says Blocked From Meeting Near Summit

docs.snippet: The leader of Venezuela's opposition-led parliament accused President Nicolas Maduro's government on Saturday of blocking legislators from Margarita island for a session alongside this week's Non-Aligned Movement summit....
docs.lead_paragraph: The leader of Venezuela's opposition-led parliament accused President Nicolas Maduro's government on Saturday of blocking legislators from Margarita island for a session alongside this week's Non-Aligned Movement summit.

docs.snippet: Hillary Clinton, at a fund-raiser on Friday, said half of Donald J. Trump supporters were “racist, sexist, homophobic, xenophobic, Islamaphobic.” By Saturday afternoon, Mrs. Clinton had acknowledged her stumble....

headline.main: $4.6M Awarded to Woman Stuck by Needle in Target Parking Lot
headline.print_headline: $4.6M Awarded to Woman Stuck by Needle in Target Parking Lot

docs.snippet: A jury has awarded a South Carolina woman more than $4.6 million after she was stuck by a hypodermic needle picked up in a Target parking lot....
docs.lead_paragraph: A jury has awarded a South Carolina woman more than $4.6 million after she was stuck by a hypodermic needle picked up in a Target parking lot.

headline.main: Militant Suspected in Bangladesh Cafe Attack Killed Himself, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Militant Suspected in Bangladesh Cafe Attack Killed Himself, Police Say

docs.snippet: A suspected militant believed by Bangladesh police to have been among the planners of a July cafe attack that killed 22 people  killed himself during a police raid on a hideout in the capital, police said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A suspected militant believed by Bangladesh police to have been among the planners of a July cafe attack that killed 22 people  killed himself during a police raid on a hideout in the capital, police said on Sunday.

headline.main: A Linguist Helping Apps Learn to Speak Millennial

docs.snippet: Marsal Gavalda, director of machine intelligence at the social network Yik Yak, works on a system that analyzes users’ posts for patterns and emotions....
docs.abstract: Vocations column; Marsal Gavalda, machine intelligence director at social network Yik Yak, discusses his profession and career.

byline.original: As told to PATRICIA R. OLSEN

docs.lead_paragraph: Marsal Gavalda, director of machine intelligence at the social network Yik Yak, works on a system that analyzes users’ posts for patterns and emotions.

headline.main: Guardiola Offers Hearty Bravo to Unconvincing Keeper
headline.print_headline: Guardiola Offers Hearty Bravo to Unconvincing Keeper

docs.snippet: Manchester City's fans may have been left covering their eyes at the hair-raising antics of their new goalkeeper in their Manchester derby triumph but manager Pep Guardiola offered a hearty "bravo" to Claudio Bravo on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Manchester City's fans may have been left covering their eyes at the hair-raising antics of their new goalkeeper in their Manchester derby triumph but manager Pep Guardiola offered a hearty "bravo" to Claudio Bravo on Saturday.
